<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.AisConnectionTestAjax</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>AisConnectionTestAjax</name> <script><![CDATA[var AisConnectionTestAjax = Class.create(); AisConnectionTestAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
start: function() { var connectionSysId = this.getParameter("sysparm_ajax_processor_connection_sysid"); var worker = new sn_ais.SearchConnectionTestWorker(connectionSysId); worker.start(); return worker.getProgressID(); },
type: 'AisConnectionTestAjax' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-08-23 18:29:49</sys_created_on> <sys_id>70f6b80053633300d0baddeeff7b12e7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>AisConnectionTestAjax</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="AI Search" source="com.glide.ais">accdbc4b6d2220100acb70b353433053</sys_package> <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_70f6b80053633300d0baddeeff7b12e7</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-28 05:14:37</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>397</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
